content: i was in a fickle-type mood when i finally kicked my own arse and boop out came this hat it s a fun simple knit with 7 cables around and 7 cables up all crossed on the 7th row hence the lucky 7 hat decreases are worked so the cables will stay the same width all the way to the final cross too all you need to get lucky is ~55-60 grams of worsted weight yarn works well with solid or variegated colorways with or without the brim options for both in pattern update pdf was updated on 4 3 08 with the following 1 note to join and knit in the round and 2 note that the type of needles circs dpns and use of stitch markers weren t included to give you the flexibility to adjust for your preferred method instead of mine *** i regretfully cannot provide pattern support at this time thank you for your understanding ***
